entry.question: During the intense battle between Bhima and Karna, what decisive action did Bhima take to overcome Karna's chariot?
entry.answer: Bhima used his mace (gada) to split Karna's chariot into two parts, rendering it unusable. This act is described in the text as a critical moment where Bhima's strength and skill turned the tide against Karna, who was a formidable warrior and son of the sun god Surya.
